text: According to traditional Chinese uranography, the modern constellation Horologium is located within the western quadrant of the sky, which is symbolized as The White Tiger of the West (西方白虎, Xī Fāng Bái Hǔ) The name of the western constellation in modern Chinese is 時鐘座 (shí zhōng zuò), meaning "the clock constellation". ==Stars== The map of Chinese constellation in constellation Horologium area consists of : {| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" |- |style="background: #E34234"|Four Symbols||style="background: #E34234"|Mansion (Chinese name)||style="background: #E34234"|Romanization||style="background: #E34234"|Translation||style="background: #E34234"|Asterisms (Chinese name)||style="background: #E34234"|Romanization||style="background: #E34234"|Translation||style="background: #E34234"|Western star name|| style="background: #E34234"|Chinese star name||style="background: #E34234"|Romanization||style="background: #E34234"|Translation |- | bgcolor="#FFD700"|White Tiger of the West (西方白虎) || style="background: #E34234; color: #FFD700"|畢 || Bì || Net || style="background: #E34234; color: #FFD700"|天園||Tiānyuán||Celestial Orchard||α Hor [http://www.newsmth.net/bbsanc.php?path=%2Fgroups%2Fsci.faq%2FAstronomy%2Fbw%2Fall%2Fbak77001%2FM.1070337303.w0 88星座中亮星的中名||style="background: #E34234; color: #FFD700"|天園增六||Tiānyuánzēngliù||6th additional star |} ==See also== *Traditional Chinese star names *Chinese constellations ==References== ==External links== * 香港太空館研究資源 ** 中國星區、星官及星名英譯表 ** 天象文學 * 台灣自然科學博物館天文教育資訊網 ** 中國古天文 ** 中國古代的星象系統 Category:Astronomy in China Category:Horologium (constellation)
title: Horologium in Chinese astronomy
